title: Fitbit Health Metrics - Long COVID/POTS Monitoring

targets.expr:
from(bucket: "fitbit")
  |> range(start: -7d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "hrv")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "rmssd" or r._field == "lf_hf_ratio"

from(bucket: "fitbit")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "activities_heart")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "restingHeartRate"

from(bucket: "fitbit")
  |> range(start: -7d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "spo2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value"

from(bucket: "fitbit")
  |> range(start: -7d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "activities_steps")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value"
